       +----------+ edit +----------+   input +----------+ compile +----------+
       | refined  |<-----+ h,cpp    +-------->+ compiler,+-------->+Executable|
       |   h,cpp  |      |          |         | linker   |         |   File   |
       +----------+      +----+-----+         +----------+         +----------+
                              | input
                              v
                         +----------+
                         | doxygen  |
                         |          |
                         +----+-----+
                              | process
                              v
                         +----------+
                         | Doxgen   |
                         | Document |
                         +----------+
